rows.label: qev091803_MSG0001
rows.name: Dale Gibbon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0002
rows.name:
You've changed faces,
but looking at you still makes me sick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's been a while since anyone's called me that.
Glad to see you finally caught on, princess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've been leaving you love letters for a while now.
It hurts to be ignored.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh, I know. We've been finding them all over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0006
rows.name: And now I'm going to show you true hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh, what fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0008
rows.name:
I never thought the Effinger girl could still be alive,
let alone here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0009
rows.name: I could say the same for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0010
rows.name: What's a death-row inmate doing alive and well on Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0011
rows.name:
There's more crooks in prison than just the inmates, princess.
On the Whale, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0012
rows.name: So you ran like a coward?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0013
rows.name:
Damned straight. I specialize in killing.
Dying isn't my game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0014
rows.name:
I made deals with every devil that'd listen
until I was on that ship's crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0015
rows.name:
But turns out living as a mimeosome
is barely different than being dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0016
rows.name:
How do I know who's inside all the people around me?
Are they even human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0017
rows.name:
Maybe New LA's crawling with puppets
and I'm the last true man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0018
rows.name: Isn't that sad? Being alone so far from home?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0019
rows.name: Didn't know you were so sensitive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0020
rows.name:
What, you wanted boring?
I'm a serial killer for hell's sakes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0021
rows.name:
Then tell me—why does an anachronism like you
start killing again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0022
rows.name:
I told you. I'm surrounded by puppets.
They never seemed worth killing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0023
rows.name: Ah. And then you saw me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0024
rows.name: Yes. And calling yourself the Murderess, no less.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0025
rows.name: Even as a mimeosome, I knew you the minute I saw you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0026
rows.name:
You look just as I remember—
shaking in terror, ready to wet yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0027
rows.name: I saw you...and there was hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0028
rows.name: I started having dreams about killing the last of the Effingers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0029
rows.name: I'm your dream? What an honor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0030
rows.name: Give it another five minutes and I'll be your nightmare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0031
rows.name:
Heh. Try me princess.
I'll flay you and all your little puppet friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0032
rows.name: No. This isn't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0033
rows.name:
All I wanted was to see you break down!
To see your terror turn to despair![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0034
rows.name: How's it feel being pushed to the brink of death?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0035
rows.name: Are you going to kill me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0036
rows.name: What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0037
rows.name: Y-you've never killed before... Not in cold blood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0038
rows.name: Surely, you don't want to become an actual murderess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0039
rows.name: Believe me. I hated you enough to want to kill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0040
rows.name:
But ironically, it was that hate for you that kept me alive.
It was that hate that made me strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0041
rows.name:
I took that title to remind me that vengeance
would someday be mine. I fed off it. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0042
rows.name: S-so...you're going to spare me, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0043
rows.name: You wouldn't be standing here today if not for me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0044
rows.name: Don't flatter yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0045_m
rows.name:
I'm here because of people like
Eleonora and Irina and my friend here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0045_f
rows.name:
I'm here because of people like
Eleonora and Irina and my friend here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0046
rows.name: I'm here because they believed in me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_JNK0010
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev091803_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell the Murderess you're glad
she seems to be coming around.

rows.label: qev091803_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091803_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask the Murderess if she's sure
she doesn't need vengeance.

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0047
rows.name: I was never a murderer to begin with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0048
rows.name:
There are plenty of other ways to get vengeance
without having to change that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0049
rows.name: Murder won't change anything. Not really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0050
rows.name: So I'll have to do this another way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0051
rows.name: I won't kill you, Gibbon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0052
rows.name: But you will die. Out here. Alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0053
rows.name: W-wait... You're leaving me here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0054
rows.name:
Please, no! Take me back home to New LA!
I'll do anything you want! Anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0055
rows.name: Sorry, pal. You never had a home with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0056
rows.name: C'mon. Let's go bail Irina out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0057
rows.name: Sharon, wait! SHARON![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0058
rows.name: ...Sharon Effinger is who I was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0059
rows.name:
But until the day my other dream comes true,
it's not who I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0060
rows.name: Aaaaaugh! Aaah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091803_MSG0061
rows.name: STOP! NOOOOAAAAAAUUUGGHH![ST:wait ]
